mapper.insert: insert into notes( notes_id, notebook_id, user_id, notes_status_id, notes_type_id, notes_title, notes_content, notes_createtime ) values( #{notes_id}, #{notebook_id}, #{user_id}, #{notes_status_id}, #{notes_type_id}, #{notes_title}, #{notes_content}, #{notes_createtime} )
mapper.select: select notes_id,notes_title from notes where notebook_id=#{notebook_id}
